Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO DOMESTIC ANIMAL WELFARE

Title: Prohibits the sale of dogs and cats by retail pet shops; authorizes space for adoption
Summary: Prohibits the sale of dogs and cats by retail pet shops; authorizes collaboration with entities to provide space to showcase cats or dogs owned by certain entities for the purpose of adoption.
LawCode: Amd ยง400, Ag & Mkts L; amd ยง752, add ยง753-f, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law and the general business law, in relation to the prohibition on the sale of dogs and/or cats by retail pet shops
